name: Consumed Orient
description:
21XX. At the center of the Desert lies a palace. A Person seeks knowledge from the last leader of China.

playtime: 3-5 minutes. please play all the way through!

By Sean Han Tani, June 2016. @sean_htch

If you like the music, follow me on Soundcloud.

Making large adventure game Even the Ocean, out September 2016. (A three year long collaboration with Joni Kittaka!)

Follow my other project Perfect here, a multimedia software/game/music album about race, work, and Taiwanese diaspora...

Personal website

INSTRUCTIONS

Arrows to move.

Press X to interact with NPCS. Press any key to advance dialogue.

Windows-only for now.

This game resets after 5 minutes of inactivity.
